tool_description: Web search API using best search engine

api_list.name: /location
api_list.description: The Location API allows users to search for supported Google search locations. You can use the `location_name` returned by this API in a Search API query to retrieve localized search results.

required_parameters.name: location_name
required_parameters.description: The name of the location to search for.

optional_parameters.name: country_code
optional_parameters.description: The country code for the location.

api_list.name: /search
api_list.description: Get real-time search results based on a query.

required_parameters.name: q
required_parameters.description: The search query, which can include any valid Google search syntax.

optional_parameters.name: google_domain
optional_parameters.description: The Google domain to use for the search.

optional_parameters.name: cr
optional_parameters.description: Limits results to websites in the specified country.

optional_parameters.name: tbs
optional_parameters.description: Advanced search parameters for filtering results.

optional_parameters.name: gl
optional_parameters.description: Determines the Google country to use for the query.

optional_parameters.name: safe
optional_parameters.description: Defines the level of filtering for adult content.

optional_parameters.name: filter
optional_parameters.description: Enables or disables filters for similar and omitted results.

optional_parameters.name: location_parameters_auto
optional_parameters.description: Automatically updates parameters based on the specified location.

optional_parameters.name: location_name
optional_parameters.description: Specifies the geographic location for the query.

optional_parameters.name: num
optional_parameters.description: Defines the maximum number of results to return.

optional_parameters.name: hl
optional_parameters.description: Determines the display language for results.

optional_parameters.name: lr
optional_parameters.description: Limits results to websites in the specified language.
